distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libtirpc fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- bsc#968175: Fix remote crash of RPC services.

Bug fixes:

- bsc#1072183: Send RPC getport call as specified via parameter.
notes.title: Description of the patch
